description: Stretch one of your arms with your palm facing forward and pull your fingers up for 10 seconds per hand.
Stretch your arm against your chest and pull it using your other arm for 10 seconds per arm.
Pull your neck with the help of your hand to the right and to the left, remaining in the position for a few seconds.
With both hands on the back of the head, bring it down, stretching the back of the region.
Cross your legs and go down with your hands outstretched towards the floor. Repeat the movement with the other leg in front.
Sitting, spread your legs and try to place your palms on the floor, repeat 3 times for 5 seconds.
Pull knee to chest and hold, change legs after 10 seconds.
Sitting, cross one leg and lean your torso forward, switch legs after 10 seconds.
Sitting, close your eyes and cover them with your palms for 2 minutes, then open normally.
In some open environment, look as far as you can in four directions for 3s, just move your eyes. repeat 3 times.
Using your thumbs, massage the area below the eyebrows in a circular motion for 15 seconds.
Standing, rotate the waist as far as you can to the left, hold for five seconds. repeat to the right.
